summary: In the late nineteenth century Paris, Briton Charles Swann, a man of wealth and culture, runs among the social set. That life is threatened when he falls in love with Odette de Crécy, a ... See full summary »
cast: Jeremy Irons|Ornella Muti|Alain Delon|Fanny Ardant|Marie-Christine Barrault|Anne Bennent|Nathalie Juvet|Charlotte Kerr|Catherine Lachens|Philippine Pascal|Charlotte de Turckheim|Nicolas Baby|Jean-François Balmer|Jacques Boudet|Jean-Pierre Coffe|Jean-Louis Richard|Bruno Thost|Geoffroy Tory|Roland Topor|Vincent Martin|Ivry Gitlis|Marc Arian|Romain Brémond|Pierre Celeyron|Jacques Delafontaine|Martin Droch|Jean Geton|Georges Liatard|Bernadette Le Saché|Jean-Gabriel Nordmann|Joëlle Pilven|Maud Rayer|Louis de Rohan-Chabot|Louis-Gaston De Segur|Daniel Tarrare|Frédéric Valade|Jean-Louis Valero|Florence Manceau|Dominique de Viliencourt|Louis Blay|Laurent Jouanneau|Laurent Vernet|Bertrand Walter|François Weigel|Pierre Arditi|Micky Sébastian|Jean Aurenche|Humbert Balsan|Véronique Dietschy|Catherine Jacob|Emmanuelle Rosenthal
title: El amor de Swann
